title: 1.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
The following paragraph by an author needs formatting:

What is GPS? GPS,or Global Positioning System, is a radio navigation system that uses satellites to work. It helps to determine the position of an object on Earth using radio frequencies. GPS mainly comprises a space segment having satellites, a control segment having ground antennas and control stations, and a user segment consisting of receivers. A network of low-earth orbit satellites work together in this system, also called a constellation, to provide positioning, navigation, and timing services. The radars available at the ground control station ensure their accuracy, and the GPS receivers catch any signal that may emanate from them.

This challenge requires you to fix the organization of this essay. Each new sentence should start from a new line.

The final output should look like this:

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
